website_summaries.verdict: A soothing spray that reduces redness and quickly rehydrates skin.
pros: Hydrating grape water is suitable for all skin types
Effectively reduces redness and calms your skin
Antioxidant-rich spray also works to set powder makeup
Or use as a primer to smooth over dry patches of skin, allowing foundation to go on more evenly
cons: Aerosol spray can is less effective as the amount of product decreases

website_summaries.verdict: A cooling spray that moisturizes and calms without causing breakouts or irritating sensitive skin.
pros: Moisturizes and helps to reduce sensitivity
Provides cooling effect on itchy, irritated skin
Easily covers your entire face in just a few sprays
cons: Some complaints of the cap falling off easily or not shipping with the product

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is fine
customer_reviews.text: The shipment takes too long. The bottle was wet when I received it. Other than that it is fine. -------Update ------------ I really really love this product. It truly reduces the redness on my nose. Highly recommend it to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I live off of this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This grape water is FANTASTIC for sensitive skin. I'm prone to redness and I keep a bottle of this everywhere. I buy it in 3's and I absoutley love it. The price is a bit high but the actual liquid and spray bottle are perfect. I never have issues with the bottle or the spray.
customer_reviews.author: Jess fletcher

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: I have been researching a lot on French skin care products and this product was highly rated and recommended. I have been using this for several weeks now and love it! No nasty chemicals. It makes my morning routine simple and I love the feeling of my skin afterwards. Firmer and smoother. Has also helped reduce redness to my rosacea (mild case). Definitely adding to my regular skin care routine!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: It does what it supposed to do, but has a smell
customer_reviews.text: My skin has become sensitive in recent years and many products irritates my face and leave redness. It does feel less dry after using it, and I have no discomfort. But the smell isn't very pleasant. I don't know if the smell comes with the "nature" ingredients and whether it supposed to even have this smell, but for the first 20 second after applying it, it kinda smells like bad grapes. It is hard to describe it other than it is not a good smell. It's not very strong and it goes away soon, but still bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R

customer_reviews.title: Great first step in AM/PM skincare
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the fine mist of this water. Spraying it on feels so luxurious! No/neutral smell, and it's 100% grape water. This product is safe for my sensitive skin. It's the first step in my routine day and night. This is a new staple for me! It's replaced my other hydrating toners as my new HG. The price for the size is absolutely fantastic. Well done, Caudalie.
customer_reviews.author: naseem

customer_reviews.title: Great for when you need a hint of moisture
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and have been struggling with breakouts. I’ve needed to go to very gentle products that don’t weigh my skin down or strip it-a really hard thing to actually accomplish. I’m loving this line, and especially this product because it lets me moisturize my face with it over doing it. I live on the coast so there’s a ton of moisture in the air. I don’t need an actually moisturizer most days. Paired with a gentle cleanser and the occasional honey mask, and my skin is finally calming down and looking decent again.
customer_reviews.author: elizabetheva

customer_reviews.title: I don’t get the hype.
customer_reviews.text: I love face sprays, especially when it’s hot and you need a cool mist on your face to refresh so I was excited to try this because I kept hearing it’s amazing. I don’t get the hype, or maybe this is a knockoff? The mist does come out nice and light, but it smells like nothing and left my face feeling dry and itchy, not refreshed. A few minutes after spraying it on my skin felt like I had sprayed saltwater or saline on my face and my skin was dryer than before using. I really wanted to love this but I just don’t.
customer_reviews.author: CCF7

customer_reviews.title: MEH
customer_reviews.text: I like me minimalist design and the fine mist. The spray is actually very precise (you don't feel like your wasting any). Unfortunately didn't notice any results after applying. I regularly use Organic face sprays and really wanted to be excited about this. The only takeaway is the pleasant light mist to the face, so maybe if you wanted this for poolside but I don't see any actual benefits such as other brands (Stone Crop..etc) where there is an immediate & lasting affect.
customer_reviews.author: shershey

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Not only can she replenish water, calm and soothe, but also anti-oxidation and anti-radiation, brighten and remove yellow, anti-radiation, very suitable for office workers rabbits who are facing the computer all day, but also Ottily spray extract 100% grape extract!
customer_reviews.author: Aggie

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and A Must Have For My Beauty Routine
customer_reviews.text: I use this grape water in many parts of my maintenance routine and find it to be a great multi tasking product to get me thru my day. I use it to help my face oils absorb, as a setting spray, dampen my beauty blender to help with product application, refreshing spray for my skin.Refreshing, smells good, and makes my skin feel nice. Doesn't really work miracles but a must have item.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Sidhu

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin and to help prevent a breakout after waxing or other hair removal treatment. I have been able to replace my toner with this item and purchased the smaller size for airplane travel. I sometimes do use a cotton pad to go over my face despite the directions, but that's only on heavy make up days.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it for anyone with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I can feel my skin become less sensitive when I use this. I recommend it for anyone with sensitive skin. Right before makeup application I spray it on and it makes it a much more pleasant experience to apply make up!
customer_reviews.author: BJensen

customer_reviews.title: 18 HR Flight. I wouldn’t leave home without it
customer_reviews.text: Great product for traveling on planes and being in an airport flying and 18 hour flight absolutely amazing. This is in my travel bag my carry-on absolutely wonderful keeps your skin very well hydrated and feels amazing not sticky not greasy absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette “RN”

customer_reviews.title: My new obsession
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE hydrating my face with this. It like a natural moisturizer. I always spray this before my primer when doing makeup, because I know I won't have any dry flakes.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Petterson

customer_reviews.title: Very hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love. Keep 4 of these at all times. One for my purse. My desk at work. And my bathroom. And by bed. Was buying at Sephora until I happened to see this and found it was cheaper on Amazon. Same size. I have very dehydrated skin and need to keep it as moist as possible all the time. This helps tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Jane  Alexander

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS! Great as a primer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The mist is fine and consistent, and really moisturizes. It's also a great alternative to a primer under your makeup, IMO. Also, the bottle lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: passengershaming

customer_reviews.title: OMG, where was it before?
customer_reviews.text: I've heard a few comments about this products, ladies using it after TCA peels. Hesitated because of the price but I will never use anything else. It moisturizing, refreshing, covering my face with paradise. I need it everyday, I love the way my skin feels, I feel I am on the tropical island. this is a must after microneedling, peel or even a evening mask.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product for boosting the moisture in my sensitive skin. Also helps to calm redness
customer_reviews.author: Susan A Ryan

customer_reviews.title: So Quenching!  Calms & Cools my Roseacea!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great, great stuff! Nothing but the good stuff in this! Very cooling, non-greasy. I put this on after makeup, then again at night after washing my face and applying night cream. It's sooo soothing and doesn't disturb makeup. Also, went to the website for the actual product and was invited to chat and ask questions, which I did! Great customer service there!
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Just wet my face
customer_reviews.text: This product did not "moisturize" my face or provide any benefit that I could detect. The only thing it did was wet my face. The smell was also not the greatest, it just smelled chemically. Amazon refunded me the cost but I had to dispose of it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Pasquini

customer_reviews.title: Best mist!
customer_reviews.text: Best mist on our face. Used before, never disappointed, could recommend to any type of skin. Thank you!!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: teo

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I'd heard it smells amazing and is so soothing. I don't know if I received a bad product, but it is just like water in a spray can, barely smells like anything but stale tap water, and doesn't do anything for me. I am incredibly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Way

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny, which is actually crazy since it's really just water. Its the spray mechanism as much as anything. Love it on an airplane!
customer_reviews.author: pink1015

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just want I needed for this hot summer. Great product and very refreshing!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S

customer_reviews.title: It is a really nice mist. The spray is even and smooth and ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a really nice mist. The spray is even and smooth and the toner inside is anti-aging. Also the smell is very pleasant.It is summer time, it gives me cool and soothing feeling. But in winter I'm sure it'll also provide good moisturize. So I'm very pleased by this grape water.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Really nice hydrating feeling
customer_reviews.text: I really like this grape water. I spray some on my face after washing and before serum and moisturizer. It feels fresh and hydrating. I have not broken out using this product. I don't think it's the most "effective" product that will do miracles for your skin, but it feels hydrating and I'll keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Arianne

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Since I ordered it, it have already used half bottle. I love it so much, it really give face moisturizing! I will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Not good for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I searched on google, how to care oily skin, I found the answer is the skin need more water, it can reduce oil. So I bought caudalie grape water, I feel the water is too oily. It didn’t work for oily skin
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Four bottle
customer_reviews.text: Been using the grape water for a long time. This is my fourth bottle already.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: For hot days
customer_reviews.text: this feels great throughout the day when its hot! I put this in the fridge and spray my face after I have to go outside. Very refreshing and moisturizing
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Go to spray on moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I use this spray to keep my skin hydrated on planes, it is cool and refreshing, I also use it to sandwhich in moisture during my night time and day time skin care routines. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Bolanos

customer_reviews.title: I like this so much
customer_reviews.text: This product can be useful anytime when I feel like it. It is light weight and doesn't feel like anything when I spray it on my face.
customer_reviews.author: zhen

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping but broken lid
customer_reviews.text: Actually I just receive the item. The shipping is very fast. However, the lid is broken and it can’t be used any more for protecting the item.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL French mist...
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a very lovely product! I will never be without it. Thank you Claudalie and Amazon!! 💛
customer_reviews.author: LT...Minneapolis MN

customer_reviews.title: We all need a little Luxury
customer_reviews.text: Using this mist is the one moment of pure joy I can count on each day. I shake the bottle very well, so that the mist is fine and it sprays so delicately over my face.
customer_reviews.author: Mesipher

customer_reviews.title: Good price and really good result
customer_reviews.text: this is the authentic stuff. Good price and really good result. great for oily skin
customer_reviews.author: Dan Z

customer_reviews.title: Mist too powerful
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't really work well as a makeup setting spray. The droplets are huge and left some residue on my foundation, and the pressure of the mist is very powerful. I had to brace myself for the impact because it smacks you in the face. The product would work better if the mist were finer. It's very moisturizing though.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: Love this fave must!
customer_reviews.text: I love the face mist. It smells nice and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Beamon

customer_reviews.title: Heaven....
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait until summer to spray this on my face after being over heated. Will keep it in fridge. Like it now. Sets makeup. Just feels great and smells good.
customer_reviews.author: MLreader

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not for me- will pack in my makeup kit
customer_reviews.text: I think the hype is too much for this product. It smells kinda funky. It is moisturizing, but I rather use a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Palhano

customer_reviews.title: Beauty must!
customer_reviews.text: This product is like the reloaded version of thermal water. It hydrates and soothes and at the same time refreshes and wakes up a dull face. The smell is so nice and natural. I apply it after I get out of the shower and on top of my make up.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. A

customer_reviews.title: Simple and great
customer_reviews.text: The mist is great. Love that this is basically water. No strong fragrance. Drys down with no residue. Will definitely be purchasing this when it is empty.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: This is a very refreshing spray. It purportedly alleviates redness from rosacea, however I didn't find that it did anything at all other than feel very nice and refreshing. I like it though - just probably won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra James

customer_reviews.title: Spa like luxury
customer_reviews.text: I spray this on my face before I put make up on to give it some hydration. It feels like a luxury, spa like. I'm 50 so I feel like a need a boost of hydration!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it when it works
customer_reviews.text: I love what’s in the bottle but my mister never lasts more than a week from this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and moisturizing on the face!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s already hydrating my skin. The scent is pleasant. No irritation, I think with continual use my face will be more moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: patricechisholm

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first then started smelling metallic..
customer_reviews.text: I love Caudalie, and I loved this product at first as my skin tends to get very dry. Then it started smelling rusty/metallic after just a couple uses. Not sure if it's because I got it via Amazon -- I'm going to have to try to get it from Sephora and see if it does the same thing. Such a bummer!
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: this is great
customer_reviews.text: This natural and so each bar get done pretty fast. each bar smells different and they are soft
customer_reviews.author: Sennie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I bought a small bottle in sephora, then ran out of it, then ordered this big bottle from amazon. Works nicely, keep it in my office to hydrate my skin and wake me up during hard working days
customer_reviews.author: Tran Le

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! And so does my skin....And my skin loves NOTHING!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CMS

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It's a very fine spray and feels light yet moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: KarenHair Don'tCare

customer_reviews.title: Not really sure yet.
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. I think I will enjoy it more in the really hot months.
customer_reviews.author: Jaynie Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Good lightweight moisture
customer_reviews.text: Good lightweight moisture, also absorbs excess oil. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Rose

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to
customer_reviews.text: Comes out like a nice gentle mist. Not too moisturizing, but just right for me during the summer in humid SC
customer_reviews.author: Apryl

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for those with skin issues
customer_reviews.text: Long time fave for me. Very good with reducing irritation and adding hydration in a refreshing mist form. Recommended for dehydrated/ sensitive skin. I have found to particularly helpful during acne flare-ups as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have rosácea and this products reduces my redness instantly, soothing my skin and cooling it. One bottle lasts me 3 months using it twice a day. No strong scent. This is my second bottle and I am excited!
customer_reviews.author: Dalila palma

customer_reviews.title: This one's for hydration!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for hydration, this is the spray to have. Besides that, it doesn't do much. I would have wanted it to do more, like brightening etc. But I guess that's a small price to pay for not having alcohol and a whole bunch of unknown ingredients, instead of having just a simple natural one. Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Shreya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best ever. dont go a day with out it! Even my boyfriend loves it. VERY refreshing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: I love this grape water facial mist! It is cooling and makes my skin feel soft. I use it morning and night after I wash my face.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: within my expectation
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and it is very refreshing. Will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cecice

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: My summer time friend. freshens me up, does not mess up any make up and hydrates my skin, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my hair, it revives my curls instantly leaving my hair soft to the touch. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: gladys cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Great hydration for ones face & T Zone.
customer_reviews.author: TravelGirl

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF IS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: OMG ARE YOU KIDDING ME? THIS STUFF IS AMAZING> I used it for the first time last night before bed and my skin feels so amazing today. I had already invested in some Ole H. Truth Serum so was reluctant to buy a new toner and just keep using my simple and affordable rose water. THIS IS SO MUCH BETTER. I thought it might just be nominally better but its over night transformation better. Im so impressed. LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Lashes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is not sealed, half left, and appear to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Yilin

customer_reviews.title: REFRESHING
customer_reviews.text: Love this face mist. Inexpensive and does not have anything harsh (or just too many ingredients) therefore never irritating my sensitive skin. Plus I feel like a goddess drowning myself in this in the coffee shop annoying my peers. It's real!
customer_reviews.author: Bri Conrado

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Gently moisturizes without having to touch your face or coat it with a cream. A light spritz also does an incredible job of refreshing your makeup.
customer_reviews.author: bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great for midday refresh, after a workout, bring to the beach, etc. Love it! Nice and light, wakes my skin up
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Mcrobbie

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: It really soothes and cools open pores as it moisturizes.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Porter

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Product is great! Careful purchasing from amazon, product was opened, used and was delivered damaged without a cap on.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Super hydrating!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water! It makes my skin feel very hydrated. I keep a bottle in just about every room and mist throughout the day. It's pricey but sooo worth it!
customer_reviews.author: k butler

customer_reviews.title: I Love These French Grapes ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Caudalie since I stumbled across this range in a French Pharmacy years ago. This Grape Water spray was my first purchase (it was the cheapest!) to travel Europe with me. Now at home in Australia my face screams for grape hydration!! The travel size never leaves my bag & this larger one I use after cleansing, whenever I feel a soothing spray is needed really. Even over makeup...like now 😉
customer_reviews.author: AntheJ

customer_reviews.title: never buy it again
customer_reviews.text: It is right thing that I want, but it is used. half of water is gone. and the bottle smells really bad (like trash)
customer_reviews.author: WG

customer_reviews.title: Not soothing
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if this is genuine but it burns my face
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful after a mask or just a refresh!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Arnot

customer_reviews.title: grape water
customer_reviews.text: water in a can that feels so good. idk if it's the grapes in it or what, but this stuff is so refreshing. the mister is fantastic and easily covers your whole face & neck with just a few spritzes. it has no scent. it has nothing that could irritate your skin. i love using it, especially in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: L. L. B.

customer_reviews.title: Its great for out of the shower spritze
customer_reviews.text: I love the freshness of this product. Its great for out of the shower spritze. You can keep it in the fridge for a cool spray on a hot day and a great way to freshen up your complexion before you apply moisturizer and foundation - let dry first.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Foster

customer_reviews.title: No cover lid, looks like used
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the item I received is a used item. No cover lid anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shuo Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Moisture Relief for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It relieves the itch of dry sensitive skin in the winter amd cools me off in tbe summer. Plus it smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of my beauty routine during pregnancy (my skin has been so dry!). Refreshing and light, it's not sticky at all. It doesn't really have a scent either, which I like. Although not inexpensive, I've enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: GR28

customer_reviews.title: Not so impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this is more a cooling spray. Was not very impressed. I also did not like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Skihasi

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: it is good. i love it so much. The price is also good. Buy it, and it will be a good choice.

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if I feel very moisturized after but I do enjoy using this as a pick me up during the ...
customer_reviews.text: feels refreshing. I don't know if I feel very moisturized after but I do enjoy using this as a pick me up during the day & to set my make up in the morning

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality is still great but the quantity seems less than expected.

customer_reviews.text: Great after working out or being out in the sun.

customer_reviews.title: what is this supposed to do?
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't impressed with this product. It is like spraying water on my face.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great spray, but had to absorbed by my skin
customer_reviews.text: It's a great spray, but had to absorbed by my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product because every time when I use it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first product review since I bought so many things on Amazon. I do not recommend this product because every time when I use it, the drop of water from spray is heavy and big. And also as the picture shows: when you use it, the water left so much on the sprayer and continued flowing to the body of the bottle. The grape water itself is OK like pure water. Not impressive. Not necessary. There are more products in the market better and cheaper than this. Sorry, but do not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but easily broken opener
customer_reviews.text: The opener is broken when there's half left in it:((((

customer_reviews.text: This is not the 6.7 oz size which it suppose to be, I received a smaller version of 2.5 oz and it looks like been used. Please fix this!

customer_reviews.title: product is good
customer_reviews.text: but they are no longer cruelty free and I have no desire to buy anything thats not cruelty free. I promptly returned it when I found out. Hopefully caudalie goes back to cruelty free as it used to be my favorite skincare line :(

customer_reviews.title: perfect
